title: Three-Way Comparison: IL vs RL with World Model vs RL with Offline Videos

experiment_summary.method_1: Imitation Learning (Baseline) - Supervised learning on expert demonstrations
experiment_summary.method_2: RL with World Model Simulation - Uses learned dynamics for exploration
experiment_summary.method_3: RL with Offline Videos - Direct RL on video sequences (ablation study)

research_contributions: First systematic three-way comparison of IL vs model-based RL vs model-free RL in surgery
Demonstration of world model effectiveness for surgical action prediction
Comprehensive evaluation framework addressing IL bias
